TopicTitle: What's your favorite day in "The Daily Kerbal?'

Articles.Content:
This is just a bit of curiosity that struck me one day, and I wanted to see for myself what everyone would choose. For me, Devnote Tuesdays and Modding Mondays come in pretty close, but I seem to like Tuesdays a bit better. It's just a whole day to see what the people down at SQUAD are working on and anything that's happened to them in their lives.

Post your favorite day and why you chose it!

P.S. This is my first official poll, bear with me if things aren't quite working right
I literally count down the days until Devnote Tuesdays
That's an easy pick! lol

Tuesdays, but Modding mondays and video Wednesdays share the second place.

Don't care much about Thursdays since twitch doesn't play on mobile, and it's often tedious to watch on PC (I rather play when I'm PC)
This is honestly a poll that answers itself...
It became one-sided pretty quickly, didn't it?
I also quite like fanwork fridays so I'm picking that so it's at least on the board.

My favorite day in the what?

EDIT: Oh, that exists. Maybe I should give it a look.

Can't we do a poll with the least favorite day? (Thursday IMO)

P.s. With papers i alway's prefer the Saturday edition, cause that one kind of tells u everything that happend during the week.. Would love to see a ''saturday'' version of the DK.
Who doesn't like devnote Tuesdays? We, as a community, are blessed to have a dev team who reaches out to us a weekly basis. It's a great read, and it really builds the hype!

People actually read the other ones?

I'll occasionally check what's on Mondays, but we all know devnotes are fuel for the hypetrain.
Devnote Tuesdays, then Modding Mondays, then the ones I don't usually read because they're often not something I can read.

I mean, I greatly enjoy seeing my fellow KSP streamers and content creators for Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays, but the devnotes are more consistently entertaining . It really depends on the entry though.

I literally count down the days until Devnote Tuesdays

I set my calendar by them.

It was a tough choice between Modding Mondays and Devnote Tuesdays, but the Devnotes won out. It finally came down to which one do I actually get anxious waiting on, and definitely the Devnotes, every Tuesday.
Devnote Tuesday (although it tends to be Wednesday for me.)
ITS TUSEDAY!!!!1!!one!!!!
So uh...I wonder which day is winning...

Yeah, I pretty much predicted that Tuesdays would come out on top. After that, I predicted it would go to Mondays, then either Fridays or Wednesdays. I haven't heard of too many people that enjoy Thursdays the most.

I literally count down the days until Devnote Tuesdays

I know the feeling.

Modding mondays, simply because i'm not huge on the versioning hype train, I prefer to be surprised to an extent, so I don't really read dev notes, only skim through them.

Also, mods are great.
